1.text: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,

2.text: Speak to the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that gives it willingly with his heart you shall take my offering.

3.text: And this is the offering which you shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass,

4.text: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’ hair,

5.text: And rams’ skins dyed red, and badgers’ skins, and shittim wood,

6.text: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,

7.text: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.

8.text: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.

9.text: According to all that I show you, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall you make it.

10.text: And they shall make an ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

11.text: And you shall overlay it with pure gold, within and without shall you overlay it, and shall make on it a crown of gold round about.

12.text: And you shall cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four corners thereof; and two rings shall be in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it.

13.text: And you shall make staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.

14.text: And you shall put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, that the ark may be borne with them.

15.text: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.

16.text: And you shall put into the ark the testimony which I shall give you.

17.text: And you shall make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.

18.text: And you shall make two cherubim of gold, of beaten work shall you make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.

19.text: And make one cherub on the one end, and the other cherub on the other end: even of the mercy seat shall you make the cherubim on the two ends thereof.

20.text: And the cherubim shall stretch forth their wings on high, covering the mercy seat with their wings, and their faces shall look one to another; toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubim be.

21.text: And you shall put the mercy seat above on the ark; and in the ark you shall put the testimony that I shall give you.

22.text: And there I will meet with you, and I will commune with you from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubim which are on the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give you in commandment to the children of Israel.

23.text: You shall also make a table of shittim wood: two cubits shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.

24.text: And you shall overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.

25.text: And you shall make to it a border of an hand breadth round about, and you shall make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.

26.text: And you shall make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof.

27.text: Over against the border shall the rings be for places of the staves to bear the table.

28.text: And you shall make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.

29.text: And you shall make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover with: of pure gold shall you make them.

30.text: And you shall set on the table show bread before me always.

31.text: And you shall make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.

32.text: And six branches shall come out of the sides of it; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side:

33.text: Three bowls made like to almonds, with a bud and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch, with a bud and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the candlestick.

34.text: And in the candlesticks shall be four bowls made like to almonds, with their knops and their flowers.

35.text: And there shall be a bud under two branches of the same, and a bud under two branches of the same, and a bud under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the candlestick.

36.text: Their knops and their branches shall be of the same: all it shall be one beaten work of pure gold.

37.text: And you shall make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.

38.text: And the tongs thereof, and the firepans thereof, shall be of pure gold.

39.text: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.

40.text: And look that you make them after their pattern, which was showed you in the mount.
